title: 8-5  Conversions between Celsius and Fahrenheit
description:
Write the following three functions:
/* Converts form Celsius to Fahrenheit */
double celsiusToFahrenheit(double celsius)

/* Converts from Fahrenheit to Celsius */
double fahrenheitToCelsius(double fahrenheit)

/* Display the table */
void display()

The formula for the conversion is
fahrenheit = (9.0 / 5) * celsius + 32

Function display() displays the table as the sample output. You should set the width of print field of each column to 12, set the precision of floating-point numbers to 2 and fixed, justify the output to the right.
author: 程序设计I Chapter5 Functions
hint: You should submit the implementation of the functions but do not submit the main() function.
